attributes.action: instruct banks not to pay bonuses, pay staff their salary, nothing else.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No more bank bonuses!

Pay bank staff, at all levels, their salary. Staff should concentrate on serving their customers.  Trying to get a bonus leads to staff harassing customers into buying services they do not want or need.

Bank bonuses no more!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
